import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch,useSelector} from 'react-redux' import {saveShippingAdress} from '../actions/cartAction' const ShippingAdress = ({history}) => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const cart=useSelector(state=>state.cart) const {shippingAdress}=cart const [input, setInput]=useState([]) function handleChange(e){ setInput({...input,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } console.log(input.adress) function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAdress({input})) history.push('/payment') } return ( <>

 ) } export default ShippingAdress
